page.title: 17KILBURN AREA:INDOOR SPORT
page.content: {SQUASH COURTS There are two{Squash Courts}measuring 6.63 by 9.64 metres. They look like cardboard boxes with concrete walls and wooden floors. Only one club uses the squash courts though in 1984_85 10,095 people used them. The courts are booked for a 40 minute sessions. {GYMNASIUM The size of the {Gymnasium}is 225square metres. It is used for gymnastics, table tennis, trampolining, weight training, volleyball and also as a meeting room for special events. At the sides of the gym are small rooms which store the equipment. The biggest piece of equipment is the trampoline and the smallest are the square pieces of artificial turf.
